content: Hello, I need some help with my heating system.
Hello! You've reached XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Could you please tell me your name?
This is John Smith. I think I dialed the wrong number though. I don't have any connection with your company.
Thank you for letting me know, John. Since this was a misdial and you do not require our services, I will mark this number accordingly and will not contact you further. Have a nice day!
